name: Article001
title: When to use MongDB Compass
content: Use MongoDB Compass to add new blog articles.
Use MondoDB Compass to moderate upvotes and comments.

name: Article002
title: The To Do List
content: 1. Add a sign-in with password, and sign-out.
2. Add CRUD for articles instead of going to MongoDB Compass..
3. Add Web based authentication (Google or other OAUTH / IAM)
